Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir ... Directed by: Robert N. Bradbury Actors: Production Company: Supreme Pictures Release Date: 29 October 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir George's missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

sources.title: Between Men (1935) JOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, Beth Marion, William Farnum
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

 When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir George's missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

metadata.Plot: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir George's missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.
metadata.Writer: Robert N. Bradbury, Charles F. Royal
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, Beth Marion, William Farnum
